resources.string: Bistro27 is the place in which exceptional gastronomy meets the perfect details for creating a comfortable safe haven filled with savor.

Whether we\'re talking about business meetings, where our services meet the highest standards of exigency, or about the romantic dinner for which we assure the ideal setting, at Bistro27 we know that the art of cooking comes from the passion of satisfying our guests."
Award winning recipes, noble selection of wines in the atmosphere of a veritable bistro.
